# ä¸ƒã€‚æ•™ææ¡ˆä¾‹

delimiter $$
create procedure pro_num (OUT ROWS INT)
begin
declare cid INT;
declare found boolean default true;
declare cur_cid cursor for
	select pno form pro;
declare continue handler for not found 
	set found = 0;
set ROWS =0;
open cur_cid;
fetch cur_cid into cid;
while found do
set ROWS=ROWS+1;
fetch cur_cid into cid;
end while;
colse cur_cid
end $$
